text: Saioni kumamoka kefo avu'ava'ma hankeno Ra Anumzamo'ma ana kumimofo nonama huno kazeri havizama hu'nea zamo'a hago vagaregahie. Ana hu'neankino Saioni vahe'ma kinama ome hu'naza vahera za'zatera tamatre'nigeta kinafina omanigahaze. Hianagi Idomu kumamoka, Ra Anumzamo'a kumika'ane kefo zanka'anena erinte ama huno, ana kumi'mofo nona'a kagri'enena knazana kamigahie.
